Rainy_Day_0: Liker du regnværsdager like mye som meg, @?
Rainy_Day_1: Vi er forskjellige på så mange måter... men det er greit.
Rainy_Day_2: God morgen, @. Jeg sto tidlig opp og fant dette til deg. [305 308 203 795 397]#$e#Jeg håper det ikke er for rart.
Rainy_Day_3: Jeg lurer på om trollmannen vet om... dette? Jeg håper han kan holde på hemmeligheten.$s
Rainy_Day_4: Så mye som jeg prøver å være sivilisert, men noen ganger får jeg veldig lyst til å finne på noe sprell...$6#$e#De påstår at dette er en tilstand som er typisk for mitt folk.
Rainy_Day_Krobus: Ah, det er mer fuktig i dag på grunn av regnet... Jeg føler meg mye mer komfortabel.
Rainy_Night_0: På netter sånn som dette kan de som stirrer ut vinduene noen ganger se skyggefigurer. Tenk... det kunne ha vært meg.$7
Rainy_Night_1: Hvis de andre skygge folkene visste om bo-ordningen vår, ville de ha... 'straffe' meg.$s#$e#De fleste av dem hater mennesker, vet du.
Rainy_Night_2: Du er kliss våt, og kald! Er ikke det farlig for din art?$s
Rainy_Night_3: Jeg har allerede spist middag, men det var ikke noe du kunne spise... sorry.
Rainy_Night_4: Helt siden jeg forlot folket mitt, har jeg lett etter et nytt hjem... nå hører jeg hjemme her. Det betyr alt for meg.
Rainy_Night_5: Det sies at mitt folk kom hit for lenge siden, da en stor katastrofe tillot ånder fra tomrommet til krysse inn i den fysiske dimensjone.
Rainy_Night_Krobus: Lyden av regnet minner meg om kloakken... det er beroligende.#$e#Kloakkene var mitt tilfluktssted... Jeg følte meg trygg der. Men ikke bekymre deg... Jeg har det på samme måte her også.
Indoor_Day_0: Hvis jeg kunne kommet og hjulpet deg, så ville jeg gjort det... men jeg skal gjøre mitt beste for å holde huset i ryddig og rent.
Indoor_Day_1: Jeg prøvde så godt jeg kunne å lage menneskemat... [203 204 651 225]#$e#Du kan spise det senere, ikke tenk på det...
Indoor_Day_2: Jeg er glad her, i huset. Jeg liker å bruke all min tid på et koselig sted... Jeg trenger ikke å "komme meg ut" som mennesker gjør.#$e#Men jeg forstår at du må! Vær så snill, ikke føl at du må bli her hos meg.$3
Indoor_Day_3: Jeg vurderer å tilbringe dagen min helt sammensveiset og fastklemt i hjørnet...#$e#Hva? Du dere gjør ikke det?$3
Indoor_Day_4: På fredager er jeg stille som et tegn på hengivenhet til Yoba. Jeg håper du ikke har noe imot det.
Indoor_Day_Krobus: Jeg skulle ønske jeg kunne hjulpet deg på gården, men jeg kan ikke gå ut i sola...
Indoor_Night_0: Jeg renset alle insektene ut av huset i dag... Beklager, jeg ikke sparte noen til deg! *smatt*$7
Indoor_Night_1: Du føles solid... noen ganger skulle jeg ønske jeg hadde bein også...$s
Indoor_Night_2: Sometimes I wonder if humans and shadow people could really ever co-exist... It's a lovely idea, but is it realistic?$s#$e#I hope so...
Indoor_Night_3: Sometimes I pause and think of all that I've learned about humans from you...#$b#I wish all my fellow shadow people could know this feeling.
Indoor_Night_4: I want to be a good housemate for you, but I never know if I'm doing well... *groan* $s#$e#I have a hard time understanding human expression. B... but... you're happy living with me?#$e#Okay!$7
Indoor_Night_Krobus: Hi, @. Welcome home. You look like you've been working hard out there!$h
Outdoor_0: I'll stay out here for just a bit, but we've got to be careful... if anyone approaches I'll need to hide!
Outdoor_1: It's rare that I can step outside!
Outdoor_3: Wide open spaces make me nervous...$s
Outdoor_4: Please go about your day, I'll just stay here and guard the house.
Outdoor_Krobus: I'll wait here for a bit, and see if any bugs come my way.#$e#I haven't had breakfast yet!
OneKid_3: I'm not sure how, but Yoba has blessed this house with a 'child'...
TwoKids_0: Don't worry... I already made %kid1 and %kid2 a void egg omelet.
TwoKids_2: I worry about the future of the children... But I trust that Yoba has a plan for them.
TwoKids_3: This house has been blessed with two children, now... Does that mean Yoba approves of our unconventional living arrangement?
Good_1: I feel a sensation in my body... is this... 'platonic love'?$l#$b#... Oh, wait... I'm just shedding my skin.$s
Good_2: I've learned to overcome my bias against humans... but Dwarves still disgust me.$a
Good_3: You started nibbling on me during the night, and mumbling about 'black lick or ish'... what did you mean by that?$3
Good_0: We're making progress, and I feel really hopeful.$h
Good_5: I was just admiring this lovely house... what a wonderful place.$l
Neutral_0: I won't ever grow old, but you will. Sometimes it makes me sad... but that's okay.$s
Neutral_1: Do you think your Grandpa would approve of a monster living in his house?
Neutral_2: Do you think we could get in trouble for living together?$s
Neutral_3: It's so bright in here... I might close my eyes for a few hours.$s
Neutral_4: I can't go outside, I can only eat certain food, I need the temperature a certain way... I hope it's not too much of a bother to live with me, @.$s
Neutral_6: I'll tell you a secret... I don't actually sleep, I just lay there with my eyes closed...
Neutral_7: You're a strange one, to want to live with a creature like me.
Neutral_8: I'm going to clean the house all day! This is fun.$7
Neutral_9: I wonder if we'll live here our entire lives? Moving would probably be too dangerous for me.
Bad_1: *sigh*... Maybe I should've stayed with my own kind.$s
Bad_2: Are you still happy, living with me?$s
Bad_4: I think you'd be happier living with another human...$s
Bad_5: I've detected a change in your behavior... what does it mean? *groan*$s
Bad_6: You only have one short life to live... are you certain you want to spend it with a hideous creature like me?$s
Bad_7: Maybe a relationship like this is destined to fail...$s
spring_1: What's your plan for the new year, @?
spring_23: You should go to the flower dance tomorrow! Don't worry about me.
summer_1: I get sunburnt very easily, so I need to be careful this time of year.
summer_8: Mmm... what's that lovely smell? You must've been sweating all night...$h
summer_15: It's summer... that means the house is full of flies.#$e#Don't worry, I'll take care of them. It's good protein!$h
fall_8: I don't feel like doing anything today.
fall_15: Have you figured out what you're going to use for your grange display tomorrow?
fall_24: If I showed up to the Spirit's Eve festival they'd put me in a cage...$s
winter_28: Thanks for letting me stay here, @. I'm looking forward to another great year!$h
spouseRoom_Krobus: #$c .5#We're so physically different that it's a challenge to live together, isn't it?#$e#I hope the humidity here isn't bothersome to you. We both have to compromise in order to live together!
spring_Krobus: It's 'spring' now, isn't it? I can smell the peppery aroma of wild horseradish.
summer_Krobus: You call this time of year 'summer', right? The warmth and humidity is nice, but I wish it wasn't so sunny.
fall_Krobus: It's been feeling a bit cooler lately, with a musty smell. You call this time of year 'fall', correct?
winter_Krobus: The darkness this time of year is very soothing. If only it were warmer!
